

Brief Context about problem
Visitor to cities for the first time, typically do not know what businesses(restaurants, parties, tour etc) they would prefer. Due to various constraints it is not feasible for the visitor to try each business to determine thier preference.


The problem that you are solving
Predicting the 'rating' or 'preference' that visitor to the city of Waterloo would give to a business in the city. 

The data you are using
We will be using the yelp data challenge dataset see found here http://www.yelp.ca/dataset_challenge


Techniques/Tools



R ggplot for datavisualization
Pig/hadoop for data tranformation, cleaning, and exploratory data analysis
Apache spark - recommender implementation
Amazon Web Service - Deployment and production 
Python django- for web application
